mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 N_TEMP, N_HUM, N_ILL, N_CO2, N_OCC FROM dbo.TB_SENSOR ORDER BY D_INSERT_TIME DESC

WITH TEMP_OBJECT AS ( SELECT A.S_GROUP_CODE, A.S_G_CODE, A.S_G_NAME, A.S_L_CODE, A.S_L_NAME, B.S_TAG_ID FROM TB_EL A, TB_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_GROUP_CODE = B.S_OBJECT_GROUP AND A.S_G_CODE = B.S_G_CODE AND A.S_L_CODE = B.S_L_CODE AND A.S_GROUP_CODE = 'E' AND B.S_USE_YN = 'Y') SELECT 'cum_today' AS DIV,/*금일 누적*/ ISNULL(ROUND(MAX(A.N_MIN_VALUE) / 1000, 0), 0) AS VALUE FROM TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL A, TEMP_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND B.S_G_CODE = 'M' AND B.S_L_CODE = 'M1' AND S_DIV = 'HH' AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') = CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) UNION ALL SELECT 'cum_yesterday' AS DIV,/*전일 누적*/ ISNULL(ROUND(MAX(A.N_MIN_VALUE) / 1000, 0), 0) AS VALUE FROM TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL A, TEMP_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND B.S_G_CODE = 'M' AND B.S_L_CODE = 'M1' AND S_DIV = 'DD' AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') = CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) - 1 UNION ALL SELECT 'cum_preMonth' AS DIV,/*전월 누적*/ ISNULL(ROUND(MAX(A.N_MIN_VALUE) / 1000, 0), 0) AS VALUE FROM TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL A, TEMP_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND B.S_G_CODE = 'M' AND B.S_L_CODE = 'M1' AND S_DIV = 'MM' AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(8), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') = DATEADD(MM, -1, GETDATE()) UNION ALL SELECT 'cum_month' AS DIV,/*금월 평균*/ ISNULL(ROUND(AVG(A.N_MIN_VALUE) / 1000, 0), 0) AS VALUE FROM TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL A, TEMP_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND B.S_G_CODE = 'M' AND B.S_L_CODE = 'M1' AND S_DIV = 'DD' AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(8), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') = CONVERT(CHAR(6), GETDATE(), 112)

WITH TEMP_OBJECT AS ( SELECT A.S_GROUP_CODE, A.S_G_CODE, A.S_G_NAME, A.S_L_CODE, A.S_L_NAME, B.S_LOAD_FLOOR, B.S_TAG_ID FROM TB_EL A, TB_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_GROUP_CODE = B.S_OBJECT_GROUP AND A.S_G_CODE = B.S_G_CODE AND A.S_L_CODE = B.S_L_CODE AND A.S_GROUP_CODE = 'E' AND B.S_USE_YN = 'Y'), TEMP_TM AS ( SELECT MAX(A.N_MIN_VALUE) AS VALUE FROM TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL A, TEMP_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND B.S_G_CODE = 'M' AND A.S_DIV = 'HH' AND B.S_LOAD_FLOOR = 'TM' AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') = CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)) SELECT CASE WHEN A.DIV = 'TM' THEN '건물' WHEN A.DIV = 'T1' THEN '1층' WHEN A.DIV = 'T2' THEN '2층' WHEN A.DIV = 'T3' THEN '3층' WHEN A.DIV = 'T4' THEN '4층' ELSE '별관' END AS DIV, ISNULL(ROUND(A.VALUE / 1000, 0), 0) AS VALUE, ROUND(A.VALUE / B.VALUE * 100, 1) AS PERVALUE FROM ( SELECT B.S_LOAD_FLOOR AS DIV, MAX(A.N_MIN_VALUE) AS VALUE FROM TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL A, TEMP_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND B.S_G_CODE = 'M' AND A.S_DIV = 'HH' AND B.S_LOAD_FLOOR IN ('TM', 'T1', 'T2', 'T3', 'T4') AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') = CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) GROUP BY B.S_LOAD_FLOOR) A, TEMP_TM B ORDER BY CASE WHEN A.DIV = 'TM' THEN 'T0' ELSE A.DIV END

WITH TEMP_OBJECT AS ( SELECT A.S_GROUP_CODE, A.S_G_CODE, A.S_G_NAME, A.S_L_CODE, A.S_L_NAME, B.S_LOAD_FLOOR, B.S_TAG_ID FROM TB_EL A, TB_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_GROUP_CODE = B.S_OBJECT_GROUP AND A.S_G_CODE = B.S_G_CODE AND A.S_L_CODE = B.S_L_CODE AND A.S_GROUP_CODE = 'E' AND B.S_USE_YN = 'Y'), TEMP_SUM AS ( SELECT SUM(A.VALUE) AS VALUE FROM ( SELECT B.S_G_CODE AS DIV, ISNULL(MAX(A.N_MIN_VALUE), 0) AS VALUE FROM TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL A, TEMP_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND B.S_G_CODE <> 'M' AND A.S_DIV = 'HH'
AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') = CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)
AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') BETWEEN CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(MM, -1, GETDATE()), 112) AND CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)
AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') BETWEEN CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(MM, -12, GETDATE()), 112) AND CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)
GROUP BY B.S_G_CODE) A ) SELECT A.S_G_CODE AS DIV, A.S_G_NAME AS DIVNM, ROUND(A.VALUE / 1000, 0) AS VALUE, ROUND(A.VALUE / B.VALUE * 100, 1) AS PERVALUE FROM ( SELECT B.S_G_CODE, B.S_G_NAME, ISNULL(MAX(A.N_MIN_VALUE), 0) AS VALUE FROM TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL A, TEMP_OBJECT B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND B.S_G_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'H') AND A.S_DIV = 'HH'
AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') = CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)
AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') BETWEEN CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(MM, -1, GETDATE()), 112) AND CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)
AND REPLACE(CONVERT(CHAR(10), A.D_ST_TIME, 112), '-', '') BETWEEN CONVERT(CHAR(10), DATEADD(MM, -12, GETDATE()), 112) AND CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112)
GROUP BY B.S_G_CODE, B.S_G_NAME) A, TEMP_SUM B ORDER BY A.S_G_CODE

SELECT D_ST_TIME, A, B, H FROM ( SELECT
B.D_ST_TIME,
B.D_ST_TIME,
SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 1, 7) AS D_ST_TIME,
A.S_G_CODE, SUM(B.N_USE_VALUE) AS N_USE_VALUE FROM TB_OBJECT A, TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND A.S_USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.S_G_CODE IN ('A', 'B', 'H')
AND B.S_DIV = 'HH' AND B.D_ST_TIME BETWEEN SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), DATEADD(hh, -24, GETDATE()), 120), 1, 13) AND SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), GETDATE(), 120), 1, 13)
AND B.S_DIV = 'DD' AND B.D_ST_TIME BETWEEN SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), DATEADD(dd, -30, GETDATE()), 120), 1, 10) AND SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), GETDATE(), 120), 1, 10)
AND B.S_DIV = 'DD' AND SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 1, 7) BETWEEN SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), DATEADD(mm, -12, GETDATE()), 120), 1, 7) AND SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), GETDATE(), 120), 1, 7)
GROUP BY
B.D_ST_TIME,
B.D_ST_TIME,
SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 1, 7),
A.S_G_CODE) AS VALUE_DIV PIVOT (SUM(N_USE_VALUE) FOR S_G_CODE IN (A, B, H) ) AS PV ORDER BY D_ST_TIME

SELECT D_ST_TIME, F, G FROM (SELECT B.D_ST_TIME, A.S_G_CODE, SUM(B.N_USE_VALUE) AS N_USE_VALUE FROM TB_OBJECT A, TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND A.S_USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.S_G_CODE IN ('F', 'G') AND B.S_DIV = 'HH' AND B.D_ST_TIME BETWEEN SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), DATEADD(hh, -24, GETDATE()), 120), 1, 13) AND SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), GETDATE(), 120), 1, 13) GROUP BY B.D_ST_TIME, A.S_G_CODE) AS VALUE_DIV PIVOT (SUM(N_USE_VALUE) FOR S_G_CODE IN (F, G) ) AS PV ORDER BY D_ST_TIME

SELECT A.D_ST_TIME, A.N_USE_VALUE AS PREDAY, B.N_USE_VALUE AS TODAY FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(A.D_ST_TIME, 12, 2) AS D_ST_TIME, ROUND(AVG(A.N_USE_VALUE) / 1000, 0) AS N_USE_VALUE FROM ( SELECT B.D_ST_TIME, SUM(B.N_USE_VALUE) AS N_USE_VALUE FROM TB_OBJECT A, TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND A.S_USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.S_G_CODE <> 'M' AND B.S_DIV = 'HH' AND B.D_ST_TIME BETWEEN SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), DATEADD(dd, -5, GETDATE()), 120), 1, 13) AND SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), DATEADD(DD, -1, GETDATE()), 120), 1, 13) GROUP BY B.D_ST_TIME) A GROUP BY SUBSTRING(A.D_ST_TIME, 12, 2)) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 12, 2) AS D_ST_TIME, ROUND(SUM(B.N_USE_VALUE) / 1000, 0) AS N_USE_VALUE FROM TB_OBJECT A, TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND A.S_USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.S_G_CODE <> 'M' AND B.S_DIV = 'HH' AND SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 1, 10) = SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), GETDATE(), 120), 1, 10) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 12, 2)) B ON A.D_ST_TIME = B.D_ST_TIME

SELECT A.D_ST_TIME, A.N_USE_VALUE AS PREDAY, B.N_USE_VALUE AS TODAY FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 12, 2) AS D_ST_TIME, ROUND(SUM(B.N_USE_VALUE) / 1000, 0) AS N_USE_VALUE FROM TB_OBJECT A, TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND A.S_USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.S_G_CODE <> 'M' AND B.S_DIV = 'HH' AND SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 1, 10) = SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), DATEADD(dd, -1, GETDATE()), 120), 1, 10) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 12, 2)) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 12, 2) AS D_ST_TIME, ROUND(SUM(B.N_USE_VALUE) / 1000, 0) AS N_USE_VALUE FROM TB_OBJECT A, TB_USE_VALUE_TOTAL B WHERE A.S_TAG_ID = B.S_TAG_ID AND A.S_USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.S_G_CODE <> 'M' AND B.S_DIV = 'HH' AND SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 1, 10) = SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(30), GETDATE(), 120), 1, 10) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(B.D_ST_TIME, 12, 2)) B ON A.D_ST_TIME = B.D_ST_TIME
